record.description: Division of women and men's gyms. Construction site of Ryerson Physical Laboratory at the right.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
record.noteGeneral: Copy has University of Chicago Archives stamp.The handwriting on the photograph identifying the structure belongs to Amos Alonzo Stagg, the athletic director, coach and head of the Department of Physical Culture from 1892-1933. Copy # 8 is located in Gymnasium (Old): Miscellaneous folder (barcode # 45034784)
